for f in *               # loop all items in the current dir
do 
  if [ -f "$f" ]         # test that $f is a file
  then
    t="${f%.*}"          # strip extension off ie. everything after last .
    mv -i "$f" "$t".ext  # rename file with the new extension
  fi
done
